payload.text: To make a deposit for a client's account, please select their account then navigate to 'Rollovers & contributions' for superannuation and 'Payments & deposits' for investments. More information on making deposits is available on our 'Help and Support' page, please select the 'Find out more' button
If you're looking for a client's EFT or Bpay details, you can find them in 'Account details' section of their account.
